value:
Behold—I am the black knight Hoðr,
wielder of the demon sword! Or at
least I can pretend to be...

It seems that, no matter the world,
the title of "black knight" is a symbol
of tremendous strength!

Lord Leif and Lord Seliph...
Where are those two headed?

As a member of House Nordion,
I must familiarize myself with the
etiquette of the Askran kingdom.

This festival is a way to remember
the legend of the 12 crusaders'
arrival, and how they saved Jugdral.

I've arrived with greetings, and to
wish a you a lifetime of friendship
with $Nf.

"With the demon sword Mystletainn
in hand, I will slay the darkness!"$k$pHehe, that's one of my lines for the
play we'll perform at the festival.

Wow, thank you so much! I'll make
sure to live up to your expectations.

I am Nanna. I'm taking part in this
festival as a descendant of one of the
12 crusaders—the black knight Hoðr.

My ancestor was one of the 12
crusaders... Hoðr the black knight.$k$pThe black knight... With a title like
that, it's easy to think of him as a
fearsome warrior...ominous, even.$k$pHowever, Hoðr was one of the 12—
the light that fought and drove
away the darkness.$k$pI suspect that his duty to help people
was more important to him than any
impressions they had of him.$k$pI must etch his ideals onto my
heart and follow his example by
supporting everyone as best I can.
This staff appears to have been modeled after Mystletainn...
Have you seen Lord Leif? I hope to show him my outfit...
I am a descendant of Hoðr, the black knight of the 12 crusaders.
My mother would enjoy this festival too, were she here with us...
I would be honored to accompany you for the festival.
